text: Chang Chen Ghost Stories is a 2016 Chinese romance horror thriller film directed by Zhan Yue. It was released in China on July 8, 2016. ==Plot== ==Cast== *Lu Shan *Fu Heng *Wu Jinxi *Song Hanhuan *Ding Qi *Wei Yun *Li Yu ==Reception== The film has grossed in China. == References == Category:Chinese films Category:2016 horror thriller films Category:Chinese horror thriller films Category:2016 horror films Category:2010s romantic thriller films Category:Chinese supernatural horror films
title: Chang Chen Ghost Stories (2016 film)
